description.value:
Prerequisite: 11th level, drow

Benefit: When you hit a creature with your darkfire racial power, they gain vulnerability 5 poison until the end of the encounter.

Revision (2/24/2010)

Change benefit to read "When you hit a creature with your darkfire racial power they gains vulnerability 5 poison until the end of the encounter."

Published in Dragon Magazine 382, page(s) 67.
